content: The **2nd Legislative Assembly of Singapore** was a meeting of the [Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore) from 1 July 1959 until 3 September 1963. ## Officeholders - [**Speaker**](/wiki/Speaker_of_the_Parliament_of_Singapore)**:** [Sir George Oehlers](/wiki/George_Oehlers) - **[Deputy Speaker](/wiki/Speaker_of_the_Parliament_of_Singapore#List_of_deputy_speakers):** - G. Kandasamy ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) until 24 September 1961 - John Mammen ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) from 16 November 1961 - **[Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore):** [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew) ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) - [**Deputy Prime Minister**](/wiki/Deputy_Prime_Minister_of_Singapore)**:** [Toh Chin Chye](/wiki/Toh_Chin_Chye) ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) - **[Leader of the Opposition](/wiki/Leader_of_the_Opposition_(Singapore)):** [Lim Yew Hock](/wiki/Lim_Yew_Hock) ([SPA](/wiki/Singapore_People%27s_Alliance)) - [**Leader of the House**](/wiki/Leader_of_the_House_(Singapore))**:** [Toh Chin Chye](/wiki/Toh_Chin_Chye) ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) - **[Party Whip of the People's Action Party](/wiki/Party_Whip_of_the_People%27s_Action_Party):** [Lee Khoon Choy](/wiki/Lee_Khoon_Choy) ## Composition PartyMembersAt [election](/wiki/1959_Singaporean_general_election)At dissolution[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)43**25**[Barisan Sosialis](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)0**14**[Singapore People's Alliance](/wiki/Singapore_People%27s_Alliance)4**4**[United Malays National Organisation](/wiki/United_Malays_National_Organisation)3**3**[United People's Party](/wiki/United_People%27s_Party_(Singapore))0**2**Independent1**2**Vacant seats0**1****Total**51**51****Government majority**35**-1** ## Members ConstituencyMembersParty[Aljunied](/wiki/Aljunied_Single_Member_Constituency)[S.
